data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Botafogo.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Botafogo throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 7, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the away team a throw-in.
Palmeiras drive forward but Wesley is judged offside.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 11, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Botafogo's Rhuan breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 17, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 21, Caio Alexandre of Botafogo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Important block from the Palmeiras defence as Matheus Babi fires in a strike for Botafogo.
In the minute 23, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Rhuan (Botafogo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 24, Botafogo are coming forward and Caio Alexandre gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 26, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Palmeiras.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 28, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 32, Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula misses with an attempt on goal.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Mayke for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Palmeiras's Willian gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 38, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras attack but Willian's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 41, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Free kick Botafogo.
Wesley (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Kevin (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 46, Goal! Botafogo have got their heads in front thanks to a Pedro Raul strike.
Kevin with an assist there.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick Botafogo.
Great finish from Caio Alexandre to give Botafogo a 2-0 lead.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Gabriel Veron is on a sub for Rony for Palmeiras.
In the minute 55, Ze Rafael is replacing Bruno Henrique for the away team.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Jailson for Palmeiras has been booked by Rodolpho Toski Marques and receives a first yellow card.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
Pedro Raul of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Ze Rafael's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 60, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Botafogo.
Raphael Veiga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Palmeiras.
In the minute 61, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matheus Babi, who is down injured.
Botafogo’s Matheus Babi is on his feet again at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 63, In Rio de Janeiro Palmeiras attack through Gabriel Veron. The finish is off target, however.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Gustavo Scarpa replacing Mayke.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 64, Lucas Lima is replacing Raphael Veiga for Palmeiras at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
The away team replace Patrick de Paula with Ramires.
In the minute 65, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
The home team have replaced Rhuan with Guilherme Santos. This is the first substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques blows against Palmeiras's Gabriel Veron for offside.
In the minute 70, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Palmeiras.
Guilherme Santos (Botafogo) has received a first yellow card.
At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos, Marcos Rocha has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a second substitution, with Carlos Renteria replacing Keisuke Honda.
Palmeiras's Lucas Lima has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 75, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Willian puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Gustavo Scarpa.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Willian for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a third substitution, with Salomon Kalou replacing Rafael Forster.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Botafogo's Diego Cavalieri has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
An attacking Palmeiras player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Willian (Palmeiras) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 86, Palmeiras's Gabriel Veron breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Sousa is replacing Caio Alexandre for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 88, Botafogo make their fifth substitution with Warley replacing Pedro Raul.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Palmeiras.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Palmeiras drive upfield and Gustavo Scarpa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Palmeiras push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Wesley gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Palmeiras.
Ze Rafael (Palmeiras) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Willian (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Rodolpho Toski Marques blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Matheus Babi (Botafogo) gets booked by Rodolpho Toski Marques, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Warley (Botafogo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
